article.title: Stanley Receives Contract for U.S. Marine Corps Information Systems Office
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Stanley Incorporated has been awarded a five-year, $22 million firm-fixed-price contract by the Global Combat Support Systems-Marine Corps (GCSS-MC) to continue support of the logistics information systems (LIS) office. Stanley will provide program management, software configuration management, system operation and system maintenance support services.
